recordTypes.name: Encroachment Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is for requesting an encroachment permit that authorizes the permittee to perform work, construct approved facilities, place temporary storage within, or restrict the right-of-way in any way.

recordTypes.name: Final Maps & Parcel Maps
recordTypes.description: Final Maps and Parcel Maps are what convert a tentative subdivision map or tentative parcel map from a conceptual approval by the Cityâ€™s Planning Commission into a legal subdivision of land.

categories.name: Public Works Department
categories.content:
The Department of Public Works is piloting a new online permitting system through OpenGov!

Effective May 1st:
This user-friendly platform will make it easier for community members and contractors to find information and apply for the following permits:
  • Encroachment Permits
  • Grading Permits
  • Transportation Permits

categories.name: Help Center
categories.content: New to the Online Permit Center? No problem! Learn how to set up a new account with the video tutorial below. Additiona
